portfolio.title: LabLink
portfolio.description: Connect UC Davis students with professors aligned to their research interests, featuring hybrid matching algorithms (TF-IDF + BM25 + semantic embeddings) and automated email drafting

portfolio.title: FinLit
portfolio.description: A comprehensive financial literacy quiz app with AI-powered insights and personalized learning paths built with React and FastAPI

portfolio.title: Xpenza
portfolio.description: A full-featured expense tracker with advanced analytics, budget management, and financial insights built with Next.js and PostgreSQL

portfolio.title: Luminum
portfolio.description: A modern landing page with dynamic animations and responsive design showcasing innovative web development techniques

portfolio.title: Signature Web
portfolio.description: An interactive digital signature capture and management system with canvas API integration for secure document signing

portfolio.title: Portfolio Website
portfolio.description: A modern, responsive portfolio website showcasing projects, skills, and experience with smooth animations and clean design

portfolio.title: Weekly Schedule
portfolio.description: A productivity app for managing weekly schedules with drag-and-drop functionality and calendar integration
